TopicTitle: Contract Configurator makes main menu unresponsive, and a kerbalism error

Articles.Content:
Hello

I've tried to get a modded install running for the last few days and finally settled on what mods to use. I install everything through ckan. Its JNSQ with kerbalism and some parts and qol mods. JNSQ and contract configurator was actually working fine a few days ago but after deciding on some other mods and a clean install it has been doing this.

Whenever I load the game with contract configurator installed (even completely vanilla), nothing in the main menu does anything. Removing the mod fixes it.

On top if this I get a Kerbalism error when I remove contract configurator and start a new game. 

I've put a picture and the logs into this shared google drive folder, as I can't seem to paste the logs onto here...

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1TmO9eDxWOWC_PnLZgfcQssqbCFD1-pgI?usp=sharing

Only other oddity I've noticed is that kerbin seems to lack clouds in the menu, but that might just be down to EVE not being setup in the game yet.

Hope you can help Thanks for all your hard work

EDIT: I've tried both 12.3 and 12.4 with no luck

Edited November 10, 2022 by sila0164
remembered extra info

Okay, so manually installing kerbalism and contract configurator fixed it... So I guess there's something wrong with the kerbalism install available on CKAN. Contract configurator seems to have quite a discrepancy with regards to versions, the one I installed being 1.30.5 and the one on CKAN being 2.2-something... So a weird one, but it works now.

Both errors were the same on completely vanilla installs. So it was not compatibility issues.
